english.segment1: Hush baby, don't cry. Just try to remember the time. When all your pitfalls and fears. Became mine
english.segment2: And when we fall apart. Just one thing takes me back to the start
english.segment3: (Chorus:). Tenderness. Put my heart to rest. Your tenderness. Hits me to the bone. Tenderness. When my head's a mess. Your tenderness. Keeps me coming home
english.segment4: Hush baby, don't cry. This rings in my head all the time. And still. I tend to forget your words
english.segment5: When I'm the swan in my full dive. Just one thing keeps me alive
english.segment7: (Bridge:). And so it seems to me. To all of us here. The answer is clear. That you need a little less stress. And some more tenderness.
